meanings.definition: A building divided into four separate living units.
meanings.sent1: The fourplex on the corner has four different families living in it.
meanings.sent2: We visited a fourplex where each apartment had its own entrance.
meanings.sent3: The fourplex looked like a mini village with four tiny houses together.
meanings.sent4: Living in a fourplex is like having three neighbors right next to you all the time.
meanings.sent5: The fourplex stood out in the neighborhood with its four distinct doors.

meanings.definition: A group of four connected houses or apartments.
meanings.sent1: The fourplexes in that area are painted in different colors, making them easy to distinguish.
meanings.sent2: Our friends decided to buy a fourplex together and live close to each other.
meanings.sent3: The fourplexes formed a cozy little community within the bustling city.
meanings.sent4: The fourplex felt like a small neighborhood within a larger one.
meanings.sent5: We enjoyed the sense of community that the fourplex provided with its four connected units.
